Give your memory and mind a boost and get smarter by improving your abilities with this fun logical memory game.

You can improve your skills with multiple brain training games. You can choose from multiple categories such as memory, logic, math, accuracy and much more.

Smarter is a brain workout game with multiple fun mini-games, all in one app. It is a skills trainer that can relax and sharpen your brain and improves your abilities in a dynamic, fun and engaging way.

Smarter - Brain Training and Mind Games doesn’t let you get bored with ~150 entertaining games. Each mini-game is different and gives you motivation to increase your skills progress and be the best.
